abstract: The decision follows other splits and departures by banks as financial institutions move to comply with the Volcker rule.
snippet: The decision follows other splits and departures by banks as financial institutions move to comply with the Volcker rule.
lead_paragraph: 12:26 p.m. | Updated Bank of America Merrill Lynch has decided to spin off its $5 billion private equity arm to the unit’s management, a spokeswoman for the bank said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Bank of America to Spin Off Buyout Arm
